item.title: Roy and Code Streak | HackerEarth Challenge
item.description: This is the HackerEarth challenge of easy level. Problem Link Roy and Code Streak. Problem: Roy is working on HackerEarth Profile. Right now he is working on User Statistics. One of the statistics data (Code Streak) is as follows: Given the User Activity Data, find the maximum number of continuous correct solutions submitted by any user. Seems easy eh? Here’s the catch! In order to maximize this number a user could have submitted a correct answer to the same problem which he has already solved.
